title: Wayne Rooney's son Kai springs into action during holiday in Barbados
text:
Go Kai! (Picture: MEGA)

Kai Rooney enjoyed some fun in the sun while holidaying with dad Wayne in Bridgetown, Barbados.

The DC United footballer and family are currently enjoying a getaway on the Caribbean island’s luxury Sandy Lane hotel, which has its own private beach.

Wayne and Kai have been joined over half term by the footballer’s two middle sons, Klay, six, and Kit, three, as well as his in-laws Colette and Anthony McLoughlin.

Early on Sunday morning, Kai decided to make the most of the hotel’s facilities and take part in some outdoor activities, living out the jet pack dream while flyboarding, an activity which sees water spray from the boots and propel the user into the air.

Wearing brightly coloured swimming shorts, the nine-year-old football protege looked to be having the time of his life as he got to grips with the exhilarating activity, screaming with excitement and waving back at his family on dry land from the air.

Rather you than us, eh Kai?

We feel a bit queasy looking at this, honestly (Picture: MEGA)

Rock and roll, dude! (Picture: Isla/Backgrid)

The family unit has been missing two very important figures during their trip for Wayne’s birthday, as Wayne’s wife Coleen stayed at home with their youngest son Cass due to illness.

Explaining why she didn’t join her family on the trip, Coleen recently said: ‘Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass.

Coleen’s son is truly fearless (Picture: Isla/Backgrid)

‘We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break.

‘Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave.

The Rooney clan (Picture: Getty)

‘I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better.’

No doubt Coleen has been in need of a break after an, erm, challenging month.

Earlier this month, Coleen shocked the nation when she claimed false stories about her were leaked from Rebekah Vardy’s Instagram account.

Rebekah vehemently denied the allegations but Coleen claimed to have screenshots as evidence.

An investigation is reportedly being carried out by Rebekah’s team to prove her innocence.
